Package org.centrale.objet.WoE

Class Joueur

java.lang.Object
org.centrale.objet.WoE.Joueur
public class Joueur extends Object
Represents the player in the world, able to move, attack, use medicine, etc.

    • getType

      public int getType()

    • choosePersonnage

      public void choosePersonnage()
      A method provided for Joueur to choose his Personnage and name. Set the position on the correspondent OCCUPIED table to 1, which means this position is occupied by the Joueur

    • affiche

      public void affiche()

    • moveUp

      public void moveUp()
      This method enables the player to move up around the world, and will detect if the target position can be moved to.

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown()
      This method enables the player to move down around the world, and will detect if the target position can be moved to.

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      This method enables the player to move left around the world, and will detect if the target position can be moved to.

    • moveRight

      public void moveRight()

    • pickObjet

      public void pickObjet()
      This method enables the player to pick up items, but only if they are directly in front of the player. Will determine the current player's type, as some items cannot be picked up by a particular player.

    • combattre

      public void combattre()
      The attack is carried out by calling the combattre method of Archer or Guerrier. Can only attack creatures directly in front of it.

    • getTarget

      public Creature getTarget()
      Get a Creature within direct attack range of the joueur. Only the nearest one is returned.
      Returns:

    • guerir

      public void guerir()
